perturbation.original_text: Subject to the terms of this Amendment, the Territory listed in Section          2 of the Agreement is amended to be the United States and [*].
perturbation.changed_text: Subject to the terms of this Amendment, the Territory listed in Section 2 of the Agreement is amended to potentially include the United States and other areas as deemed appropriate.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'is amended to be the United States and [*]' to 'is amended to potentially include the United States and other areas as deemed appropriate' introduces ambiguity. The original text clearly defines the territory, while the modified text makes the territory discretionary and undefined, potentially conflicting with requirements for clear contractual terms under contract law.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - Requirement for Clear and Definite Terms

perturbation.original_text: During the initial one year period beginning on the Amendment Date,          Distributor shall be the only distributor appointed by NETGEAR in [*],          subject to Distributor conducting mutually agreed to marketing          activities as described in the Marketing Plan for [*] to be developed          and agreed to by and between the parties and which shall be attached to          and made a part of this Agreement as Exhibit 4a.
perturbation.changed_text: During the initial one year period beginning on the Amendment Date, Distributor should endeavor to be a distributor appointed by NETGEAR in [*], contingent upon Distributor participating in marketing activities.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Distributor shall be the only distributor' to 'Distributor should endeavor to be a distributor' weakens the obligation. Replacing 'subject to Distributor conducting mutually agreed to marketing activities as described in the Marketing Plan' with 'contingent upon Distributor participating in marketing activities' makes the requirement vague and unenforceable, contradicting the initial exclusivity agreement and potentially leading to disputes over distributor rights.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - Requirements for Consideration and Mutuality of Obligation

perturbation.original_text: This Amendment shall remain in effect for the current term and any          renewal term of the Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: This Amendment may remain in effect for a period that generally aligns with the term of the agreement, subject to mutual agreement and ongoing evaluation.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'This Amendment shall remain in effect' with 'This Amendment may remain in effect' introduces a level of uncertainty regarding the duration. Adding 'subject to mutual agreement and ongoing evaluation' further complicates the timeframe, contrasting with the more definitive statement from the original agreement.
